name: Bitbucket Paint It Dark
description: Dark theme for bitbucket.org with black and greys. Please send any bug reports or change requests using the "Send Feedback" button and I will try to update as soon as possible. Visit my website for more projects BTC Tip: 1NenJ5mP4T5gbR9fsoGMDgDzWCiWXypAwG LTC Tip: LeowJ8pxiCsdDx5oBAGYco5sHEfXhpRsgz Doge Tip: DUDQKiB9zFFqFmyx64GuiR6rW9Cxzg1Viu
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://bitbucket.org/") {
/* Black style */
    body,
    .app-header,
    #content,
    #page,
    .monaco-editor .margin,
    .jPhqnV.jPhqnV,
    .geizcp,
    .hDsREg,
    .gjHukE,
    .cbmjag,
    .aui-page-panel,
    table.aui > tbody > tr, 
    table.aui > tfoot > tr,
    body.adg footer.subfooter__branded-domains,
	.CodeMirror,
	.kHkCrN
    {
    	background-color:#000!important;
        color: #FFF!important;
        border-color: #111!important;
	}

    /* Dark Gray style */
    .lksUJi,
    .monaco-editor, 
    .monaco-editor-background, 
    .monaco-editor .inputarea.ime-input,
    .iYJWvo,
    .JOWQG,
    .hHMZeS,
    .ciTfIg,
    .iWaoLr,
    .ketCUk,
    .jbfVuX,
    .bKmbBd,
    body.adg3 .aui-button.aui-button-subtle,
    .LnFvQ,
    .isxXCt.isxXCt,
    .wiki-content pre, ak-editor-bitbucket .ProseMirror pre,
    .enmvUb,
    .cRyNpi,
    .workflow-box,
    body.adg3 form.aui .buttons-container,
    .gJpjhA,
    .gwgOyD,
    .bwONWl,
    .cNPzpf,
    .ldXZiL,
    .fWzPyr,
    .exuviZ,
    .fJPuZg,
    body.adg header.header__branded-domains,
    body.adg footer.footer__branded-domains,
	.bb-content-container-footer,
	.bb-content-container-header,
	.CodeMirror-gutters,
	.kniSWF
    {
     	background: #0a0a0a!important;
    	color: #CCC!important;
    	border-color: #111!important;
	}

    /* Light Gray Style */
    .bjMcDu,
    .fsLtsC,
    .aui-dropdown2.aui-style-default,
    section.adg.gray-light,
    body.adg3 .filter-status > li[aria-pressed="true"] a,
    .YpnWJUkd9mWBsWccfvn-e,
	.jagMGM,
	.WPdMA,
	.file-source-container .toolbar,
	.highlighttable td.annotations, .highlighttable td.linenos, .highlighttable td:first-child.annotations, .highlighttable td:first-child.linenos,
	.bb-udiff .heading,
	.refract-container .gutter
    {
    	background: #222!important;
        color: #CCC!important;
        border-color: #111!important;
	}

    /* font only */
    .mtk1,
    small,
    .filter-container .filter-label,
    body.adg3 .wiki-content h1, 
    body.adg3 h1,
    #wiki-content h1, #wiki-content h2, #wiki-content h3, #wiki-content h4, #wiki-content h5, #wiki-content h6,
    body.adg3 .wiki-content h3, body.adg3 h3, body.adg3 section h1, body.adg3 section h2, body.adg3 section section h1,
    body.adg3 form.aui .field-group div.checkbox label, body.adg3 form.aui .field-group div.radio label, body.adg3 form.aui fieldset.group div.checkbox label, body.adg3 form.aui fieldset.group div.radio label,
	.refract-content-container .line-numbers, .refract-content-container .common .source
    {
		color: #FFF!important;
	}

    /* link colors */
    .cdTZyM, 
    .cdTZyM:hover,
    .jIjiAo, 
    .jIjiAo:hover,
    body.adg3 table.aui > tbody > tr > td a,
    body.adg3 .filter-status > li a,
    body.adg3 .aui-nav-breadcrumbs a,
    body.adg3 .aui-nav-breadcrumbs > li, 
    body.adg3 .aui-nav-breadcrumbs > li + li::before,
    .jRoiuT.jRoiuT,
    .dEArll a, .dEArll a:hover,
    .gNaMKe.gNaMKe,
    .cuxrfP a, .cuxrfP a:hover,
    a.hmHNYA,
    a.cuDrRn,
    ._1b506KczAhJL1InVj8D1KJ
    {
   		color: #0052cc!important;
	}

    /* Disable sidebar animations */
    .OGBKZ,
    .LnFvQ,
    .gJpjhA,
    .gwgOyD,
    .bwONWl,
    .cNPzpf,
    .ldXZiL,
    .fWzPyr,
    .exuviZ,
    .fJPuZg
    {
		transition: none!important;
		-webkit-transition:none!important;
	}
}
